constants.description: Just to trigger change for dev pipeline
constants.name: doNotUse

customErrorMessages.errorMessage: The partnership objective is incomplete! Please complete all key results and change the objective's status to "Completed" before closing opportunity.

decisions.description: Is this a biz dev / partnership opp? If so go to dedicated path
decisions.name: Partnership_Opp_Check
decisions.label: Partnership Opp Check

rules.name: TRUE_401_k_Opportunity_Closes
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND ((5 AND 10) OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 11)

rightValue.stringValue: Single(k) to Custom(k) w/ New Comp

rules.label: TRUE

Flow.description: Added validation for partnership opportunities with an associated objective. Prevents closure with an incomplete objective

formulas.name: isSimplyDate
formulas.expression: IF( ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Service_Option__c}, "Simply Retirement"), TODAY(), IF( ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Service_Option__c}, "Custom(k) MML"), {!$Record.Restatement_Date__c}, null ) )
